mil7.2.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘gadrabhassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.1:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, gadrabho nama sankarakutepi catukkepi singhatakepi gamadvarepi thusarasimhipi yattha katthaci sayati, na sayanabahulo hoti;
mil7.2.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena tinasantharepi pannasantharepi katthamancakepi chamayapi yattha katthaci cammakhandam pattharitva yattha katthaci sayitabbam, na sayanabahulena bhavitabbam.
mil7.2.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, gadrabhassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.1:1.5: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena ‘kalingarupadhana, bhikkhave, etarahi mama savaka viharanti appamatta atapino padhanasmin’ti.
